name: Marching Training
description:
Ye... It barely fits the theme, but we were running out of ideas, and time was ticking... (^u^")

Also, sorry if game is quite barebone and hard to play, it's my first attempt to a rhythm game... :3

Made In Around 30hrs With Manaki_Senpai

ActionKeyboardControllerLeft StepZButton SouthRight StepXButton EastHaltCButton West

Again Huge Thank You To Manaki Senpai For The Beautifull Art!! (^U^)
